pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1" value="" style="swimlane;startSize=0;fillStyle=solid;fillColor=#F5F5F5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="40" width="500" height="530" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-2" value="<h1>Deployment Strategy</h1>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="-2" width="260" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1" source="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-5" target="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-5" value="Create Docker instance" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="270" width="155" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1" source="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-4" target="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1" source="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-4" target="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-4" value="Run automatized tests" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="185" width="155" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-6" value="Deploy on Kubernetes" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="360" width="155" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-9" value="Build, lint and check backend code" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="100" width="155" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-15" value="<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: initial;">On every push on the `main` branch, the deployment strategy is run.&nbsp;</span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: initial;">First, we'll run the backend build and check its code quality using a tool like ESLint and Prettier for the code formatting and style of our application.</span><br></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: initial;">After that, we'll run the automatized tests to make sure everything works as it's expected in production.</span></p><p style="text-align: justify;">Finally, we'll created a Docker instance with all the necessary dependencies to run a new container from the application and deploy it into the Kubernetes orchestration cluster.</p>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;horizontal=1;" vertex="1" parent="-SFPksBDGyhx4x5gPUQ_-1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="100" width="220" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: Build, lint and check backend code

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 109px; margin-left: 241px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.span: On every push on the `main` branch, the deployment strategy is run.
First, we'll run the backend build and check its code quality using a tool like ESLint and Prettier for the code formatting and style of our application.
After that, we'll run the automatized tests to make sure everything works as it's expected in production.

div.p: Finally, we'll created a Docker instance with all the necessary dependencies to run a new container from the application and deploy it into the Kubernetes orchestration cluster.

switch.text: On every push on the `main` branch,...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
